title: Who We Are?
desc1: In the era of post-industrialization where upgraded technologies and ICT skills are the game changers but learning them could prove to be challenging PFTP pledges to equip its students with the necessary skills to enable their employment and progress.
desc2: It is one of the largest initiatives which is comprised of 30+ technical and non-technical courses that fall into the 6 domains and have numerous services to offer such as eBay, POS systems, amazon, ERP systems, and digital marketing.
